title: Thanks to +Green Car Reports for starting our week off on a great note with their recent review of our...

object.content:
Thanks to +Green Car Reports for starting our week off on a great note with their recent review of our SKYACTIV® 2013 Mazda CX-5. Some of our favorite parts:

"On a road test that covered 260 miles, split about two-thirds highway and one-third local, a 2013 Mazda CX-5 we tested earlier this year returned a remarkable 33.1 miles per gallon."

"There's also likely a SkyActiv diesel version of the CX-5 coming next year or the year after. If Mazda's new diesel four-cylinder engine is proportionally as efficient as its gasoline engine is, we wonder if that might not be the first 40-mpg compact crossover on the market."

"...The fun begins when the "Start" button is pressed. Mazda was sufficiently confident in the CX-5's roadholding and handling, in fact, that it invited journalists to take the CX-5 around the notorious Laguna Seca racetrack during the press launch. The crossover acquitted itself admirably, with neutral, predictable handling, not that much body roll, and remarkably good electric power steering..."

"We think that's a pretty compelling package. Well done, Mazda."
